messages.title: It's a Two Horse Race in elections in West Dorset!
messages.content: Ros lives locally, she shops where we shop, her children were educated in our schools, she works here, she drives round our roads and even sometimes uses our bus service.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: In Government the Lib Dems put helping the family at the centre of what they have been doing.
The Lib Dems are committed to increasing NHS spending by at least Â£6 billion a year in real terms by 2020 and will pay for this by raising the tax that higher earners pay on their shares.
The Lib Dems in Government have insisted that mental health is treated as seriously as all other types of health care.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Better Deal for the Elderly
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dem achievements include making sure that the basic state pension goes up by the highest of earnings, prices or 2.5% whilst also ensuring you can keep working as long as you want without losing a single penny of your state pension.
Ros is 100% committed to tackling climate change and believes that a left-green centrist group of MPs can make a huge difference.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Ros Kayes can beat the Conservatives here.

issues.environment: Ros is 100% committed to tackling climate change
issues.health: The Lib Dems are committed to increasing NHS spending

contactInformation.address:
Anne Wheatley
11 High Street
Puddletown
Dorchester
DT2 8RT

endorsements.endorsement: People wish that politics wasn't so party political.  Ros is someone whose principles over-ride party politics.
I normally vote Green if I can, but in the General Election I will be voting for Ros.
I'm really thankful to Ros for her whole-hearted commitment and hard work in all she undertakes.
Thank God someone is listening to those who suffer, they need advocates like Ros more in this day and age.
